TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_trv_Qngqaya_djiyun_Truku_kdjiyax, title = Qngqaya_djiyun_Truku_kdjiyax, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Seediq]}, url = {https://trv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Qngqaya_djiyun_Truku_kdjiyax} }

S.FORM: Qngqaya djiyun Truku kdjiyax 太魯閣族日常用品 Qngaya djiyun kndsan Truku sbiyaw o niqan 4 keelgan djiyu. qngqaya mahan 喝的用具 pratu mahan=(tutu djima sun uri)= djiyun mimah sinaw wihi=(snalu qhuni) = djiyun mimah bgu damat. kayu=(snalu qhuni) = psaan bgu mtalux hahaw=(sahaw sun uri,snalu snkaan rudan hiyi sangi)= djiyun smahug qsiya. qngqaya tmsamat 狩獵用具 Buji=(snalu skuy aji uri o djima) =djiyun smbu samat Reesug=(snalu skuy aji uri o djima) =djiyun smbu samat Bhniq=(snalu dha qhuni) =djiyun smbu samat Smbrangan=(snalu qhuni) =djiyun smbu samat Qlubung=(gasil nuqih , qhuni ni quwarux) =djiyun ptjiylan samat. Aga=(snalu djima) =djiyun smbu rapit ni qbhni. qngqaya paan 揹的用具 Towkan= (tnunan waray nuqih) =djiyun paan samat aji uri o paan qngqaya tmsamat Takil=(tunan waray nuqih) =djiyun paan samat aji uri psaan tunux pais Brunguy=(tunan quwarux) =djiyun mmiyak kuyuh Truku Paga(snalu qhuni) =djiyun paan mdngu rpiq qhuniaji uri. Towkan rqling=(tnunan waray nuqih)=paan risaw Truku Brunguy rqling=(tnunan quwarux=paan wauwa Truku Wahug=(tnunan waray nuqih aji uri o quwarux)= jiyun paan towkan aji uri o brunguy. qngqaya uqan 食的用具 Taku=(snalu tpaqan samat , pusu djima ni qhuni)=sahug idaw. Isux=(snalu tpaqan samat , pusu djima ni qhuni)=jiyun misux gmuwang idaw masu Gupuq=(snalu uraw)=psaan idaw hjiyuun musa qmpahan Wihi=(snalu qhuni) =sahug bgu damat qngqaya mhapuy 煮的用具 Kulu luan=(snalu qhuni)=psluun muwax dhquy ptulan. qngqaya qeepah 農具 Parih=(snalu sida qhuni)=jiyun kmari bunga ni pshnuk dxgal. Suqu=(snalu qhuni)=jiyun pshuk dxgal tntakan Btug=(snalu djima aji uri o skuy)=jiyun kmtuy masu. qngqaya tmikan 搗米的具 Duhun=(snalu qhuni)=jiyun tmikan masu, sqmu, basaw, Sru=(snalu qhuni)= jiyun tmikan Qaya cinun(snalu qhuni ni djima)=jiyun mseusa(tminun qabang) qngqaya lubug 琴具 Tatuk=(snalu qhuni)=lubug tmatuk Lubug qawqaw=(snalu djima)=lubug psaun pdahung Mgagu=(snalu djima)=lubug miyuk Lubug qnawal=(snalu qhuni an qnawal rqling)lubug qnawal pshnang qngqaya tninun 織布具 Brunguy =(snalu uraw)=djiyun mapa Bgiya=(snalu uraw)=djiyun tmbus Gupuq=(snalu quwarux)= psaan uqun Plian=(snalu uraw)=psaan lukus Bahu=psaan lukus(snalu ruaw) Sisi=(snalu quwarux)jiyun qmp

Qngqaya djiyon Troko kdjiyax 太魯閣族日常用品 Qngaya djiyon kndsan Troko sbiyaw o niqan 4 keelgan djiyo. qngqaya mahan 喝的用具 prato mahan=(toto djima son ori)= djiyon mimah sinaw wihi=(snalo qhoni) = djiyon mimah bgo damat. kayo=(snalo qhoni) = psaan bgo mtalox hahaw=(sahaw son ori,snalo snkaan rodan hiyi sangi)= djiyon smahog qsiya. qngqaya tmsamat 狩獵用具 Boji=(snalo skoy aji ori o djima) =djiyon smbo samat Reesog=(snalo skoy aji ori o djima) =djiyon smbo samat Bhniq=(snalo dha qhoni) =djiyon smbo samat Smbrangan=(snalo qhoni) =djiyon smbo samat Qlobong=(gasil noqih , qhoni ni qowarox) =djiyon ptjiylan samat. Aga=(snalo djima) =djiyon smbo rapit ni qbhni. qngqaya paan 揹的用具 Towkan= (tnonan waray noqih) =djiyon paan samat aji ori o paan qngqaya tmsamat Takil=(tonan waray noqih) =djiyon paan samat aji ori psaan tonox pais Brongoy=(tonan qowarox) =djiyon mmiyak koyoh Troko Paga(snalo qhoni) =djiyon paan mdngo rpiq qhoniaji ori. Towkan rqling=(tnonan waray noqih)=paan risaw Troko Brongoy rqling=(tnonan qowarox=paan waowa Troko Wahog=(tnonan waray noqih aji ori o qowarox)= jiyon paan towkan aji ori o brongoy. qngqaya oqan 食的用具 Tako=(snalo tpaqan samat , poso djima ni qhoni)=sahog idaw. Isox=(snalo tpaqan samat , poso djima ni qhoni)=jiyon misox gmowang idaw maso Gopoq=(snalo oraw)=psaan idaw hjiyoon mosa qmpahan Wihi=(snalo qhoni) =sahog bgo damat qngqaya mhapoy 煮的用具 Kolo loan=(snalo qhoni)=psloon mowax dhqoy ptolan. qngqaya qeepah 農具 Parih=(snalo sida qhoni)=jiyon kmari bonga ni pshnok dxgal. Soqo=(snalo qhoni)=jiyon pshok dxgal tntakan Btog=(snalo djima aji ori o skoy)=jiyon kmtoy maso. qngqaya tmikan 搗米的具 Dohon=(snalo qhoni)=jiyon tmikan maso, sqmo, basaw, Sro=(snalo qhoni)= jiyon tmikan Qaya cinon(snalo qhoni ni djima)=jiyon mseosa(tminon qabang) qngqaya lobog 琴具 Tatok=(snalo qhoni)=lobog tmatok Lobog qawqaw=(snalo djima)=lobog psaon pdahong Mgago=(snalo djima)=lobog miyok Lobog qnawal=(snalo qhoni an qnawal rqling)lobog qnawal pshnang qngqaya tninon 織布具 Brongoy =(snalo oraw)=djiyon mapa Bgiya=(snalo oraw)=djiyon tmbos Gopoq=(snalo qowarox)= psaan oqon Plian=(snalo oraw)=psaan lokos Baho=psaan lokos(snalo roaw) Sisi=(snalo qowarox)jiyon qmp
